00001 //MultilayerPerceptron.cpp

00003 #include "Includes.h"
00004 #include "NetworkModel.h"
00005 
00006 using namespace std;
00007 
00008 namespace pann
00009 {
00010     namespace NetworkModel
00011     {
00012         /*
00013          * TODO: write documentation
00014          */
00015         Net* MultilayerPerceptron(vector<unsigned> layers, ActivationFunction::Base* af)
00016         {
00017             const unsigned threads = 64;
00018 
00019             Net* net = new Net(0);
00020      
00021             if(layers.size() == 0)
00022                 return net;
00023 
00024             vector< vector<unsigned> > mlp(layers.size());
00025 
00026             //Input neurons
00027             for(unsigned i = 0; i < layers[0]; ++i)
00028                 mlp[0].push_back(net->addInputNeuron());
00029 
00030             if(layers.size() < 2)
00031                 return net;
00032 
00033             //Layers
00034             unsigned owner = 1;
00035             for(unsigned l = 1; l < layers.size(); ++l)
00036                 for(unsigned i = 0; i < layers[l]; ++i)
00037                 {
00038                     mlp[l].push_back(net->addNeuron(af));
00039                     net->setNeuronOwner(mlp[l][i], owner);
00040                     if(++owner > threads)
00041                         owner = 1;
00042                 }
00043        
00044             //Connections
00045             for(unsigned i = 0; i < mlp.size() - 1; i++) //layers
00046                 for(unsigned j = 0; j < mlp[i].size(); j++) //prev layer
00047                     for(unsigned k = 0; k < mlp[i+1].size(); k++) //next layer
00048                     {
00049                         //Connection from current layer (i) to next (i+1)
00050                         net->addConnection(mlp[i][j], mlp[i+1][k], 1); //TODO: add rand() weight
00051 
00052                         //Add bias connection
00053                         net->addConnection(net->getBiasId(), mlp[i+1][k], 1);
00054                     }
00055             
00056             //May be we should save mlp for next use
00057             
00058             return net;
00059         };
00060     };
00061 
00062 }; //pann
